metadata.name: MONA LISA
metadata.description:
Leonardo da Vinci - Mona Lisa
Original animated artwork by THURB 

-----------

The project is a tribute that connects art history with the NFTs.
The time when artists sold their unique paintings in galleries with a certificate of authenticity. (which I think is kind of the same principle with NFTs today)
I represented paintings known to all but in my style and animated (such as the Mona Lisa, The Scream, The Son of Man)
